problem_text_cn: 如图,PA、PB分别切⊙O于A、B,点C和点D分别是线段PA、PB上的动点,并且CD始终保持与圆O相切,若PA=8cm,则△PCD的周长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O to A and B respectively. Point C and point D are the moving points on line segments PA and PB, and CD always remains tangent to circle O. If PA = N_0, then perimeter of △PCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PA、PB分别切⊙O于A、B,∴PB=PA=8,∵CD切⊙O于E,∴CA=CE,DE=DB,∴△PCD的周长=PC+PD+CD=PC+PD+CE+DE=PA+PB=8+8=16(cm)．故选:C．
